text: DXCP (585 kHz) Radyo Totoo is an AM radio station owned by South Cotabato Communications Corporation, the media arm of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Marbel. The station's studio is located along National Highway, Brgy. Lagao, General Santos.Diocese of MarbelAlmirante: Employer-employee relationship to confer jurisdictionNa-comatose na brodkaster patay naMEET THE PRESS WITH BUREAU OF JAIL MANAGEMENT AND PENOLOGYFormer radio broadcasters win city council, prov’l board seats ==References== Category:Radio stations in General Santos Category:Radio stations established in 1992 Category:Catholic radio stations
title: DXCP
